譊字的基本解释

譊
náo
〔譊譊〕喧嚷，争辩，如“彼唯人言之恶闻，奚以夫譊譊为乎？”

譊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náo］
［《廣韻》女交切，平肴，娘。］
(1)争辩；喧嚣。
(2)通“撓”。挑逗。

譊字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譊； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1180第16
【唐韻】女交切【集韻】【正韻】尼交切【韻會】泥交切，?音鐃。【說文】恚呼也。【徐曰】聲高噪獰也。【廣雅】鳴也，語也。【後漢·儒林傳】雄所謂譊譊之學，各習其師。【蜀志·孟光傳】光好《公羊春秋》，而譏呵《左氏》，每與來敏爭此二義，光常譊譊讙咋。【晉書·庾純傳】臨時喧譊。　又【玉篇】爭也。【揚子·法言】譊譊者，天下皆訟也。【註】譊譊，爭聲。　又【集韻】【類篇】?馨幺切，音憢。懼也。與嘵同。或作憢。

譊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
譊字的起名意思

指争辩，喧嚣。

Basic explanation of words
Chrysanthemum
náo
〔譊譊] yelling and arguing, such as "He is the only evil thing that humans say, is it true that the husband's 譊譊 is?"
Chrysanthemum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [náo]
["Guangyun" female cross-cut, flat meal, mother. ]
(1) Argument; noise.
(2) Through "torsion". tease.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　譊; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1180 to 16
[Tang Yun] female cross cut [Ji Yun] [zheng rhyme] Ni cross cut [rhyme meeting] mud cross cut,? Yin 铙. 【Said Wen】Xun Hu also. [Xu Yue] The voice is loud and noisy. [Guang Ya] Ming Ye, Yu Ye. [Post-Han · Ru Lin Biography] Xiong's so-called sienna studies, each learns from his teacher. [Shu Zhi·Meng Guangzhuan] Guanghao "Gongyang Chunqiu", and ridiculed "Zuo Shi", every time he quarreled with Lai Min for this ambiguity, he often chuckled. [Book of Jin·Biography of Yu Chun] Temporary noise.　[Jade articles] Contend again. 【Yangtze·Fayan】Those who are guilty, all the world is litigated. [Note] 譊譊, contention.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Xin unitary cut, soundless. Fear too. Same as 哓. Or as Bang.
